TABREF0.text: SUPPLEMENTARY TABLESTable S1. …….…………………………..…………………………………………………2 Table S2………………………………..…………………………………………….……..3 Table S1. Summary of select epidemiological reports examining the clinical profiles of patients with COVID-19 in China While COVID-19 has evolved rapidly into a global pandemic, detailed clinical profiles of patients have only been described in China. As such, the China PEACE Million Persons Project 1 and the China Hypertension Survey 2 are included for reference as epidemiological comparators prior to COVID-19. Yang et al.12 present a systematic review of over 40,000 patients including many described in the other included reports.
